creator: darryl@darrylmiles.org
text:
Please accept this minor patch to make the error report a little more useful
when you are using Include directive from multiple configuration files.

creator: rpluem@apache.org
text:
Apart from the fact that you attached the reverse patch :-), I committed it to
the  trunk as r420307 (http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=420307&view=rev).

creator: rpluem@apache.org
text: Proposed for backport to 2.2.x as r661883 (http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&revision=661883)
